manage_store_description: Manage your online store efficiently. Create products, publish them, receive orders, and deliver to your customers seamlessly.
manage_work_effectively: Manage your work more effectively with Markium
store_starting_point: Your complete e-commerce solution. Create products, publish online, receive orders, and deliver seamlessly to your customers.
create_products_desc: Easily create product listings with images, descriptions, and pricing. Publish instantly to your online store.
manage_orders_desc: Track all incoming orders in one place. Process, update status, and manage customer requests seamlessly.
track_delivery_desc: Monitor delivery status, coordinate with logistics, and ensure timely delivery to your customers.
store_solution: Everything you need to run a successful online store. Streamline your workflow and grow your business.
confirm_status_change: Are you sure you want to change order {{order}} status to {{status}}?
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
maintenance_period_value: Maintenance Period Value (Number of months or distance)
periodic_maintenances_paragraph: Here you can add and edit system settings for periodic maintenance of company vehicles for later use in maintenances.
hi_welcome_back: Hi, Welcome Back to Markium ðŸ‘‹
states_paragraph: Manage different states related to your operations. You can add new regions or edit existing states to keep your data updated.
colors_paragraph: Manage different colors related to your operations. You can add new colors or edit existing colors to keep your data updated.
countries_paragraph: Manage different countries related to your operations. You can add new countries or edit existing countries to keep your data updated.
car_models_paragraph: Manage different car models related to your operations. You can add new car models or edit existing models to keep your data updated.
neighborhood_paragraph: Manage different neighborhoods related to your operations. You can add new neighborhoods or edit existing neighborhoods to keep your data updated.
car_companies_paragraph: Manage different car companies related to your operations. You can add new car companies or edit existing companies to keep your data updated.
specs_paragraph: Manage different vehicle specifications related to your operations. You can add new vehicle specifications or edit existing specifications to keep your data updated.
license_types_paragraph: Manage different license types related to your operations. You can add new license types or edit existing licenses to keep your data updated.
payment_methods_paragraph: Manage different payment methods related to your operations. You can add new payment methods or edit existing ones to keep your data updated.
documents_paragraph: Manage documents related to your operations. You can easily add new documents or edit existing documents.

starting_point: The starting point for your next project is based on MUI. Easy customization helps you build apps faster and better.
intro: We are a fleet management system
manage_vehicles_desc: A reliable system that makes it simple to organize and control your fleet efficiently.
track_maintenances_desc: Markium is designed to simplify maintenance tracking and cost management, keeping your operations smooth.
contracts_incomes_desc: Easily manage and extend contracts while monitoring incomes, saving you time and money.
radical_solution: We collected the most popular needs, problems, and enhancements, and prepared a radical solution. Dive in!
product_original_desc: We ensure you receive only authentic products from verified manufacturers and authorized distributors.
product_replacement_desc: Free replacement within 10 days if you receive a defective or damaged product.
product_warranty_desc: Full manufacturer warranty coverage for 1 year from the date of purchase.
rating_must_be_greater: Rating must be greater than or equal to 1
email_must_be_valid: Email must be a valid email address
template_selection_description: Choose a template that best represents your brand and appeals to your target audience. You can change this at any time.
select_template_description: Select a template below to preview and apply it to your store
template_clothing_description: Perfect template for fashion and apparel stores
template_shoes_description: Elegant design for footwear and accessories stores
template_furniture_description: Spacious layout ideal for furniture and home decor
template_kitchen_description: Modern design for kitchen appliances and cookware
template_jewellery_description: Luxurious template for jewelry and precious items
template_autoparts_description: Professional layout for automotive parts and accessories
template_islamic-lib_description: Elegant design for Islamic books and religious content stores
template_islamic-lib2_description: Alternative elegant design for Islamic books and religious content
template_spices_description: Traditional and aromatic design celebrating the richness of spices and herbs
template_default_description: Universal template suitable for all store types
logo_guidelines_description: Upload a square logo with transparent background for best results. Recommended size is 512x512 pixels.
upload_your_store_logo: Upload your store logo to display across your store
website_must_be_valid_url: Website must be a valid URL
store_information_description: Manage your store's business information and contact details that will be displayed to customers.
store_slug_helper: Your store will be accessible at this subdomain. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
store_slug_min_length: Store subdomain must be at least 3 characters
store_slug_max_length: Store subdomain must be at most 30 characters
store_slug_invalid_format: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed
store_slug_no_hyphen_edges: Subdomain cannot start or end with a hyphen
describe_your_store: Describe your store and what makes it unique
auto_renew_description: Automatically renew your subscription before it expires
points_reset_warning: Points reset annually on January 1st. Unused points will be forfeited.
upload_additional_images_description: Upload additional images for this product. You can add multiple images at once.
